text:
He is currently wowing fans on the BBC's adaptation of War and Peace.
But actor Paul Dano was impressing attendees at the Golden Globes awards on Sunday, where he cut a modern - and dapper - figure.
The rising star attended the annual ceremony in a sharo-suited tuxedo with equally-glam girlfriend Zoe Karzan.
Scroll down for video
Modern man about town: Paul Dano impressed attendees at the Golden Globes awards on Sunday, where he cut a modern - and dapper - figure
The 31 year-old, from New York city, impressed onlookers in his navy blue ensemble which also consisted of satin lapels.
He capped the look with a crisp, white shirt and a silk bow tie.
Looking distinctly more suave and fresh-faced than his TV alter-ego, Pierre Bezukhov, he certainly seemed on good form as he posed with his blonde partner.

Cute couple: Joined by girlfriend Zoe Karzan, the 31 year-old from New York city scrubbed up very well
In character: Paul on-set of War and Peace with Tuppence Middleton and acclaimed star Tom Burke
Opting for a simple aesthetic, she sported a floor-length white and cream number with semi-sheer detail for added statement.
The 32 year-old - who's hit movies include The Savages, Revolutionary Road and It's Complicated - wore her hair in a severe bob and went without excessive accessories, instead brandishing understated diamonds.
She capped the look with a rigid clutch bag for a truly synchronised style.

Recognise him? Paul's impressive CV boasts a host of hit movies, including Beach Boys biopic Love and Mercy, Looper and Little Miss Sunshine
Taking to Twitter, the screen star said: 'Huge thanks to my friend @leithclark for dressing me in this beautiful @MIUMIUofficial gown & @CHANEL jewels'.
Meanwhile, Paul's impressive CV boasts a host of hit movies, including Beach Boys biopic Love and Mercy, Looper and Little Miss Sunshine.
